name: My Custom Profile
description: Describe what this profile is for.
_source_language_comment: Optional. Defaults to English. Set to the source language of your book.
style_instructions:
Instructions for the translator about style, tone, vocabulary.
Each line is a separate instruction.
Write instructions in the TARGET language for best results.

Examples:
- Verwende formelles / informelles Deutsch
- Bewahre den humorvollen / ernsten Tonfall
- Erhalte die kurzen, knappen Saetze des Autors

glossary_seed._comment: Pre-seeded translations for key terms. Model will also auto-discover more.

temperature._comment: Lower = more consistent/literal, Higher = more creative. Range: 0.0 - 1.0

_min_review_chars_comment: Paragraphs shorter than this get pass-1 only (no review). Lower = more reviews = better quality but higher cost.
_context_comment: Update rolling plot summary every N translate() calls. Lower = better consistency but higher cost.
_glossary_comment: Extract new glossary terms every N translate() calls. Lower = better consistency but higher cost.
